firstNightReminder: Whenever appropriate, treat the Hermit as if they are the other Outsiders, including waking them at night, and using other Outsiders reminder token. If the Hermit duplicates an in-play Outsider, use the Hermit's '1', '2' and '3' reminders instead. The Hermit may remove the Hermit from play during setup, resulting in one less Outsider than normal. If this happens, the Hermit may still be a bluff given to the Demon.
otherNightReminder: Whenever appropriate, treat the Hermit as if they are the other Outsiders, including waking them at night, and using other Outsiders reminder token. If the Hermit duplicates an in-play Outsider, use the Hermit's '1', '2' and '3' reminders instead.
name: Hermit
ability: You have all Outsider abilities. [-0 or -1 Outsiders]

firstNightReminder: Wake the Summoner and show them three not-in-play character tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Summoner has a 'Night 3' reminder. Wake the Summoner. They point at a player, and to a Demon icon on the character sheet. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the 'You are' card, the thumbs down evil sign, and the Demon token. Replace their character token with the Demon token and put the new Demon to sleep.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

name: Baron
ability: There is an extra Outsider in play. [+1 Outsider]
